extendedInfo.description: Now you can always be ready to pop a bottle. Simply unwrap, shake, pop the cork and watch the champagne flow. Whatever the occasion, game winning touchdown, toasting to newly weds or thriftily expressing your love for another, Champagne is here!

reviews.title: Poppin the bubbly
reviews.comment: The reviews are funny. What did you think this app would do? Solve a rubix cube for you? It pops champagne. Go buy the real deal if you want it poured
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Dude this app works fine. Samsung galaxay. No problems on my phone. Could ya\'ll make it pour out too. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesnt work. Can only take off foil. Shaking and popping the cork doesn\'t work. Dell Streak
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Borin
reviews.comment: Not like commercial can\'t pour the bottle the one in the commersial is cooler
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not as good as geico commercial!
reviews.comment: I want the geico commercial one that you can pour after. This sucks and you have to close it after each use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: DEFIINATELY not as good as the geico commercial, dont get it, its not the same as the one on the commercial
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does what it says, but I honestly only downloaded it because of the Gieco Commercial and this is Nowhere Near as Cool :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: IT IS AWESOME! NO PROBLEMS AT ALL
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yeah...so this has got to go.
reviews.comment: I was hoping this was the same app used in the Geico commercial but much to my dismay....its not. Not only can you NOT pour but the app has no sound.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Retarded u don\'t even have to shake it for it to pop. Uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I didn\'t think the app was too terribly bad. I just wish you could do more with the app then just opening the champagne bottle.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cool the first time but only duz one thing and really boringg..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome. Will give five stars if the longer you shake affects the burst
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I figured I\'d play with it... but its useless. The \"unwrapping\" is you just click once and there\'s a drawn out sound effect with no animation even...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sucks. Saw the commercial got the app. It let\'s me unwrap the foil. Pretty much it. SUCKS!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its ok, but it gets old. Uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nick
reviews.comment: \"Allow me to pop the bubbly!\" I\'d give it a 5 if you could poor it after you pop the cork.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Decent. Neat enough to keep.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Instructions are easy to read just got to look closely at the animation Kyle...Great app nice job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Could be cool but slow and not responsive
reviews.author: A Google User
